= Introduction =

How to Build Ftk Under Fedora12




*Should install these Packages :*
  automake autoconf sysconftool libtool libjpeg-devel libpng-devel libX11-devel libXext-devel gtk-doc glib2-devel
*Use the following command to install these packages:*
  'sudo yum install automake autoconf sysconftool libtool libjpeg-devel libpng-devel libX11-devel libXext-devel gtk-doc glib2-devel'
